ygData.subject: Re: Shadowstep-Gate Success Stories??
ygData.msgSnippet: My alteration is maxed.. (about 80).. and I think I have achieved a combine total of 10 feet for all the times I have casted shadow step.  I don t know why,
ygData.messageBody:
My alteration is maxed.. (about 80).. and I think I have achieved a combine
total of 10 feet for all the times I have casted shadow step. I don't know
why, the spell just hates me.. sometimes I wind up one step away from where
I was! I can run there faster! And I'm not talking about in dungeons or
anything, this is in big open areas.

Tandayen, Dark Elf Wizard



>
> From: "McGraw, T. David" <Mcgraw.Thomas@...>
>
> My shadowstep distance has increased proportional to my
>Alteration skill.
> Now that my skill is maxed I rarely get a short distance
>teleport. I have
> been known to jump halfway across the zone when I cast it,
>which gives
> plenty of time to gate.
>
> Yours,
>
> ~Aereuss Ravins of Tarew Marr
>
